bio_text: Frontend developer creating usable and scalable interfaces for web products. I work at the intersection of design and engineering, with a strong focus on code quality, user experience, and modern web technologies.
clean_code_subtitle: Write clear, well-structured, and maintainable code, following best practices.
ux_ui_attention_subtitle: Design interfaces with a strong focus on usability, logic, and user experience.
learning_subtitle: Continuously learn new approaches and tools to support professional growth.
tech_stack_card_subtitle_1: I have hands-on experience with Vue and key ecosystem tools, including Nuxt, Pinia, Vuex, Vue Router, Vuetify, Vue I18n, and VueUse. I use them to build scalable SPAs and universal web applications.
tech_stack_card_subtitle_2: I develop modern solutions using JavaScript and TypeScript, leveraging a broad set of libraries and tools to implement complex business logic and interface-level features.
